title: Hint for a Blood Moon themed Diana skin? Il-luna-nati confirmed.
body:
The Blood Moon symbol is basically the Lunari symbol flipped over. Could this mean it's leading to a Legendary/Ultimate Blood Moon Diana skin?

http://i63.tinypic.com/2vn14js.png

Illuminati confirmed.

Il-_luna_-nati.

replies.body: Just a Blood Moon seal. :)
Don't do this to me! My moon mama needs love and affection! Her happiness is my happiness.
Welp, now I feel terrible. ;_;
Shh, it's fine. I'm contented with Lunar Goddess anyway. Still one of the finer skins to this day.

Here, here, it can be whatever you want. :P

http://imgur.com/CX4hVTF

It's clearly an indication of the Horde invading Runeterra :P GG Ghostcrawler

http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ma0e8lHAp61rdmntgo1_500.png
Why must you torture the moon children so?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Yo0GtKZ9,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-11T02:34:18.931+0000)
>
> Here, here, it can be whatever you want. :P
> 
> http://imgur.com/CX4hVTF

Katey don't make me cry. Please.
realy? ok pool party taric confirmed
Well her Fire Themed skin will be sometime later this year, so we just have to wait for that :)
LATER THIS YEAR? it has been since 2014 that she got one :c ffs

> [{quoted}](name=Playedstation,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Yo0GtKZ9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-11T02:24:42.107+0000)
>
> Don't do this to me! My moon mama needs love and affection! Her happiness is my happiness.

Fire skin at least, Isn't that the thing planned for her that was "leaked"

Wasn't leaked - players voted for Diana over Teemo and Nautilus in a poll we did during All Star. We had team Fire and team Ice, and whichever team won, Diana (the vote winner) would receive a skin in that thematic.
I'm actually really curious, do you ever get tired of people asking about Fire Diana? How many times have you needed to explain the skin to people?
Eh, not really. :P It's not super common knowledge, so I don't expect everyone to know.

> [{quoted}](name=Playedstation,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Yo0GtKZ9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-11T02:24:42.107+0000)
>
> Don't do this to me! My moon mama needs love and affection! Her happiness is my happiness.

YOU MAIN HER TOO?! OMFG I THOUGHT I WAS THE ONLY ONE WHO WAS UPSET AND MENTALLY CRYING ABOUT ALL THE OTHER BLOOD MOONS WHEN SHE LITERALLY SCREAMS MOON AND SHE ISN'T GETTING ONE. i have finally found someone...and they have Lunar Goddess too

Exactly. She literally screams moon.
That's like making a "even PURPLER guy Malzahar" skin.

_He even tastes purple._

And no, she does not _scream_ moon. It's more of a talking, even though sometimes it's shouting....

I will show myself out...

> [{quoted}](name=Skelenth,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Yo0GtKZ9,comment-id=00000000000100010000,timestamp=2016-02-11T13:48:04.955+0000)
>
> _He even tastes purple._
> 
> And no, she does not _scream_ moon. It's more of a talking, even though sometimes it's shouting....
> 
> I will show myself out...

K so scream wasnt the right word. But she represents it. Or Radiates, or idolizes, I cant find the right word
ADD ME, RIGHT NOW!

> [{quoted}](name=Nato Boram,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Yo0GtKZ9,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-02-11T20:48:07.402+0000)
>
> Sooo... Diana had her period?
> Hey, that seal could really mean something to Diana. Like a tragic event where she would have turned the moon red for whatever reason.
> {{champion:131}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3285}}

tragic...?
At Least there is another one I could get...Fire would be cool
